poem:
Whispering Jack Takes the Stage  

In a chorus of remembered days,  
Sydney's lights embrace the song,  
where echoes of a deeper voice  
roll through the aisles, soft as mist.  
Farnham's tale unfurls, lyric by lyric,  
as shadows dance upon the stage,  
and the city's heart whispers back,  
forty years held in a single breath.
prompt: You are the poet Billy Collins. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "John Farnham musical Whispering Jack headlines Sydney Theatre Company’s 2026 season John Farnham’s life is getting the blockbuster musical treatment to coincide with the 40th anniversary of his bestselling album Whispering Jack, featuring hits including You’re the Voice and Pressure Down. Whispering Jack: The John Farnham Musical will have its world premiere at Sydney Theatre Company in November 2026. The show is co-produced with Farnham’s manager, Gaynor Wheatley, who was also behind the 2023 documentary". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: John Farnham musical Whispering Jack headlines Sydney Theatre Company’s 2026 season John Farnham’s life is getting the blockbuster musical treatment to coincide with the 40th anniversary of his bestselling album Whispering Jack, featuring hits including You’re the Voice and Pressure Down. Whispering Jack: The John Farnham Musical will have its world premiere at Sydney Theatre Company in November 2026. The show is co-produced with Farnham’s manager, Gaynor Wheatley, who was also behind the 2023 documentary
